name: Validate different search options under Unified Search dropdown

testSteps.description: Given underwriter is on home page
When UW click on Unified Search Dropdown

Then verify the below options are present under unified search dropdown as
| All |
| Policy/Quote |
| Agency |
| Insured |
| Entity Id |
| FEIN |
| DOT |
